subheading: Kallet is a free, client-side interface helping you interact with the Kaleidochain. Our easy-to-use, open-source platform allows you to generate wallets, interact with smart contracts, and so much more.
obtainAddress: Para obtener una dirección ETH y generar tu clave privada. Guardar y conservar la clave será tu responsabilidad.
accessMyWalletDesc: Enviar o intercambiar sus ETH y fichas, comprar dominios de ENS, interactuar con contratos inteligentes y mucho más! Esto es donde la magia sucede.
aboutSubheading: Kallet, pone a tu alcance la cadena de bloques Ethereum. Somos unos apasionados de las criptomonedas dedicados a ofrecerte la forma más segura, intuitiva y nos atrevemos a decir bonita de administrar tus tokens ETH y ERC-20. Siempre estamos disponibles para ayudar y nunca abandonaremos el ETH. ¡Saludos!
aboutMewWalletDesc: Acceso a cartera original y más confiable cliente de blockchain de Etereum, ahora con una serie de nuevas características de los contenidos en una interfaz elegante y fácil de usar.
aboutHardwareWalletDesc: Kallet ofrece soporte para todas carteras de hardware importante, incluyendo contabilidad, password y muchos más.
aboutSwapDesc: Kallet has partnered with Bity, Kyber Network, Changelly, and Simplex to allow users to swap fiat to crypto, ETH and BTC, ETH and ERC-20.
aboutMewConnectDesc: Kallet's companion app brings hardware-wallet style security to your iOS or Android smartphone, helping you to secure your funds as never before.
faqsSubheading: ¿No has encontrado la pregunta que buscas?
socialSubheading: Get in the know and see your balance grow (we hope)!
howToCreateWalletTitle: How do I create a new wallet?
howToCreateWalletDesc: Kallet offers three ways to create a new Kaleidochain wallet. These are via KALconnect, Keystore file, or Mnemonic phrase. For more information, click
whatIsMewConnectDesc: KALconnect is our companion mobile app for Kallet. We call it a hardware wallet without all the hardware. Now available for all Android and iOS smartphones! Read more
workingWOtherWalletsTitle: Can Kallet work with other wallets?
workingWOtherWalletsDesc: Kallet supports many different wallet types including hardware wallets, such as the Ledger Nano S or Trezor, and third-party wallets like MetaMask. We are also open for anyone to use their Ethereum wallets with the appropriate information. Read more
howToSendTxTitle: How can I send a transaction?
howToSendTxDesc: Kallet lets anyone with a balance of KAL or ERC20 tokens send a transaction, without additional charges. Using the Kaleidochain takes gas, which is paid for in KAL, so we recommend having at least .01 KAL to cover around 2 - 3 transactions. Read more
forgotPasswordPrivKeyTitle: I forgot my password/private key! What can I do?
forgotPasswordPrivKeyDesc: Kallet does not offer support to recover or reset passwords/private keys. We always suggest writing down private keys and passwords on physical paper/notebooks for safekeeping. Maybe you saved it on your computer! For ideas on what to look for, read more
welcomeToV5Desc1: Welcome to the brand new Kallet! If this is your first time visiting, check out our {0}.
welcomeToV5Desc2: Vintage Kallet can still be accessed {0}.
